snippet: The Government Accountability Office is to release a report indicating that the supply of lithium used in most United States nuclear reactors is drying up.
abstract: Government Accountability Office will release a report indicating that the supply of lithium used in most United States nuclear reactors is drying up; problem reflects withering away of American industrial infrastructure of all things nuclear and highlights nation's dependence on foreign sources for energy-critical materials.
lead_paragraph: The Government Accountability Office is to release a report indicating that the supply of lithium used in most United States nuclear reactors is drying up.

headline.main: Report Says a Shortage of Nuclear Ingredient Looms
headline.print_headline: Report Says A Shortage Of Nuclear Fuel Looms
